Key Match Events: Moustafa Mashal scored the first goal for Qatar in the 4th minute
Almoez Ali scored the second goal for Qatar in the 46th minute
Yusuf Abdurisag scored the third goal for Qatar in the 85th minute
Anirudh Thapa had a real chance to score in the 42nd minute but his shot went wide of the post
Pre-Game Insights: Igor Stimac made five changes to the starting line-up that defeated Kuwait in the first match
Post-Match Reflections: Stimac said that his team will play better in their next match
The Indian team was unable to withstand Qatar's dominance throughout the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Qatar obtained 10 corners in the first half and India got none
Suresh Singh made a great turn in the midfield and found Sahal Abdul Samad free on the left in the 65th minute but he shot well wide of the second post
Others: Amrinder Singh, who replaced Gurpreet Singh Sandhu in goal, wasnâ€™t at his best today
